x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: Add snc_internal role to Service Management Core files in sys_report table that do not have any roles. This has to be done for files that are added after the explicit roles plugin is installed.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Update role for SM Core ACL reports
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.sys_name: Update role for SM Core ACL reports
